price: Do not set up with Allah any other god, or else you will be despised and forsaken[20].
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا
footnotes: [20] Having none to thank them for it, nor support them in the least.
